name: The Alchemist's Enigma
description: You've stumbled upon the hidden laboratory of a long-lost alchemist. A series of cryptic puzzles bars the way to their ultimate creation.

puzzles.name: The Elemental Lock
puzzles.question: /images/elemental_lock.jpg
puzzles.hint: Follow the classical order of the elements by assumed density.
puzzles.description: The entrance is sealed by a lock with four dials, three are set: Earth, Water, Air. A nearby chart shows the four fundamental elements. You must set the fourth dial to gain entry.

puzzles.name: The Whispered Incantation
puzzles.question: GUR ZRGNY VF GUR XRL
puzzles.hint: A wheel on the wall spins halfway around.
puzzles.description: Once inside, a disembodied voice echoes a cryptic phrase. It sounds like an incantation, but the words are jumbled. A carving on the wall depicts a wheel of letters.

puzzles.name: The Coded Grimoire
puzzles.question: GL XIVZGV TLOW LMV NFHG URIHG FMWVIHGZMW OVZW
puzzles.answer: TO CREATE GOLD ONE MUST FIRST UNDERSTAND LEAD
puzzles.hint: To understand the script, one's perspective of the alphabet must be reversed.
puzzles.description: You find the alchemist's grimoire, but a key passage is in code. The script seems to flow backwards, as if in a mirror.

puzzles.name: The Transmutation Formula
puzzles.question: 4d61676e756d204f707573
puzzles.hint: A strange script of 16 characters, where every pair seems to form a single letter.
puzzles.description: Tucked into the grimoire is a parchment with a long string of numbers and letters. It looks like a formula, perhaps the name of the final work.

puzzles.name: The Final Creation
puzzles.question: /images/transmutation_equation.png
puzzles.hint: What element is created when Mercury (Hg) captures an electron, causing a proton to become a neutron?
puzzles.description: You've reached the final chamber. A projection of light shows a nuclear transmutation equation. Solve for the missing element to reveal the true name of the stone.
